switch.name: fcc/speeds/vmin-factor
switch.test: fcs/flap-pos-deg ge 0.1 fcs/slat-pos-deg ge 0.1 fcc/speeds/vmin-latch ne 1
fcs/flap-pos-deg ge 0.1 fcs/slat-pos-deg lt 0.1 fcc/speeds/vmin-latch ne 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/spd-prot/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active eq 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 1 position/wow eq 1 attitude/pitch-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/pitch-rad lt -0.20944 attitude/roll-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad lt -0.558505 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt le fcc/speeds/vmo-mmo

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pah/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 fcc/lsas/spd-prot/active ne 1 attitude/pitch-rad le 0.558505 attitude/pitch-rad ge -0.20944 attitude/roll-rad le 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.558505 fcc/lsas/in-detent eq 1 position/wow eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge 100

switch.name: fcc/lsas/prd/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 attitude/pitch-rad le 0.558505 attitude/pitch-rad ge -0.20944 attitude/roll-rad le 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.558505 fcc/lsas/in-detent eq 0 position/wow eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge 100

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pap/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 position/wow eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pnl/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 gear/unit[1]/WOW eq 1 gear/unit[2]/WOW eq 1 spoilers/auto-speedbrake-feedback gt 0

switch.name: fcc/yaw/active
switch.test: fcc/yaw/avail-upper-a eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-upper-b eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-lower-a eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-lower-b eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pnl/output
switch.test: fcc/lsas/pnl/active eq 1 fcs/spoiler-left-feedback gt 10 fcs/spoiler-right-feedback gt 10

pid.name: fcc/lsas/spd-prot/vc-kts-rate
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of IAS

pure_gain.name: fcc/elevator-feel/afs-output
pure_gain.description: Schedule the AFS the same as yoke for when AFS is disconnected with yoke movement

switch.name: fcc/lsas/autotrim-switch
switch.test: fcc/lsas/pah/active eq 1 fcc/lsas/pah/output ge 0.02 /controls/flight/elevator-trim le 0.064516 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118
fcc/lsas/pah/active eq 1 fcc/lsas/pah/output le -0.02 /controls/flight/elevator-trim ge -1.0 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118
fcc/lsas/prd/active eq 1 fcc/elevator-feel/output ge 0.15 /controls/flight/elevator-trim le 0.064516 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118
fcc/lsas/prd/active eq 1 fcc/elevator-feel/output le -0.15 /controls/flight/elevator-trim ge -1.0 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118

channel.name: FCC: Yaw Axis and Yaw Damper

switch.name: /gear/abs/active
switch.test: /gear/abs/armed-avail eq 1 /gear/abs/mode ne 0 /gear/abs/spoilers-cmd-deg gt 0 position/wow eq 1 /velocities/groundspeed-kt ge 60

pid.name: /gear/abs/decel-rate-kts
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of decel
